scripts.comment: draw on stage using mouse cursor
draw on stage using mouse cursor
draw on stage using mouse cursor
使用鼠标光标在舞台上绘图 draw on stage using mouse cursor

按空格键开始运行 按“d”放下笔 按“u”抬起笔 按“c”清除舞台 按“+”增加笔尺寸 按“-”减小笔尺寸 按“s”显示精灵 按“h”隐藏精灵 press "spacebar" to start run press "d" for pen down press "u" for pen up press "c" to clear stage press "+" to increase pen size press "-" to reduce pen size press "s" to show sprite press "h" to hide sprite
